-- | Wholesome mathematical staple food

@package Leibniz
@version 0.1.0.0


module Leibniz.Constants

-- | Ye old faithful constant.
π :: Floating f => f

-- | Let's not start a flamewar.
τ :: Floating f => f


module Leibniz.Trigonometry

-- | Radians to degrees
deg :: Floating f => f -> f

-- | Degrees to radians
rad :: Floating f => f -> f


module Leibniz
